source.73b71aa5:
df1 = pd.DataFrame({'Math': ['Midterm exam', 'Finalterm exam'], 'Score': [90, 80]})
df2 = pd.DataFrame({'Math': ['Midterm exam', 'occasional exam'], 'Rank': [3, 10]})

df1.merge(df2, how='inner', on='Math')

df1 = pd.DataFrame({'Math': ['Midterm exam', 'Finalterm exam'], 'Score': [90, 80]})
df2 = pd.DataFrame({'Math': ['Midterm exam', 'occasional exam'], 'Rank': [3, 10]})
df1.merge(df2, how='left', on='Math')

df1 = pd.DataFrame({'Math': ['Midterm exam', 'Finalterm exam'], 'Score': [90, 80]})
